item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, May 7, 2025 at 11:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Clippy – 90s UI for local LLMs (954 points | 235 comments)
2. Claude's system prompt is over 24k tokens with tools (332 points | 124 comments)
3. Launch HN: Exa (YC S21) – The web as a database (343 points | 118 comments)
4. OpenAI reaches agreement to buy Windsurf for $3B (510 points | 461 comments)
5. WebMonkeys: parallel GPU programming in JavaScript (48 points | 8 comments)
6. Cuttlefish 'talk' with their arms, study reveals (32 points | 6 comments)
7. Alignment is not free: How model upgrades can silence your confidence signals (73 points | 18 comments)
8. Matt Godbolt sold me on Rust by showing me C++ (445 points | 394 comments)
9. docker2exe: Convert a Docker image to an executable (70 points | 38 comments)
10. VVVVVV Source Code (273 points | 44 comments)
11. Tabular (YC S24) Is Hiring ( | hide)
12. (ab?)using Node module hooks to speed up development (29 points | 6 comments)
13. Old Timey Code and Old Timey Mono Fonts (130 points | 17 comments)
14. Bloat is still software's biggest vulnerability (2024) (150 points | 101 comments)
15. Gemini 2.5 Pro Preview (614 points | 582 comments)
16. ACE-Step: A step towards music generation foundation model (83 points | 33 comments)
17. Show HN: Whippy Term - GUI terminal for embedded development (Linux and Windows) (71 points | 9 comments)
18. Brush (Bo(u)rn(e) RUsty SHell) a POSIX and Bash-Compatible Shell in Rust (128 points | 70 comments)
19. DoorDash to acquire Deliveroo (123 points | 168 comments)
20. India launches attack on 9 sites in Pakistan and Pakistani Jammu and Kashmir (347 points | 370 comments)
21. Accents in latent spaces: How AI hears accent strength in English (212 points | 109 comments)
22. Nnd – a TUI debugger alternative to GDB, LLDB (253 points | 78 comments)
23. Scientists have found a way to 'tattoo' tardigrades (35 points | 16 comments)
24. Time Between The Lines: how memory access affects performance (2015) (5 points | discuss)
25. FTC rule on unfair or deceptive fees to take effect on May 12 (155 points | 97 comments)
26. Sutton and Barto book implementation (68 points | 9 comments)
27. Is Planet Nine Alone in the Outer System? (100 points | 53 comments)
28. Loving 21st century gaming like an 18th century furniture expert (18 points | 1 comment)
29. New studies offer insight into Lyme disease’s treatment, lingering symptoms (191 points | 121 comments)
30. Show HN: Plexe – ML Models from a Prompt (108 points | 44 comments)
